resources.string: Thank you for downloading our Jet Tag store app, where you can find and add all of the latests tags we offer. \n\nClick next to get started!

Scroll through the current list of shoes we have for sale. 
If you would like to add a new design to the catalogue click the plus button of the bottom right hand corner. 
Once you are finished you can logout by clicking the menu item at the top right hand corner. 

Enjoy!
